SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActualView, ControllerHandler, ControllerProvider, ViewInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application implements ActualView
The main class of the GUI. It manages the transitions between the different scenes and holds the controller. It also manages the logs and the updates of the lobby, the game and the lobby list.
See Also:
